snippet: A decline in emissions in developed countries is more than matched by growth from developing countries like China and India.
abstract: A decline in emissions in developed countries is more than matched by growth from developing countries like China and India.
lead_paragraph: “Global emissions of carbon dioxide were at a record high in 2011 and are likely to take a similar jump in 2012, scientists reported Sunday,” Justin Gillis and John M. Broder wrote in The New York Times.

headline.main: Carbon Dioxide Emissions Hit Record High in 2011, Researchers Say
